Name: HomeShield
Description: Comprehensive coverage for the structure of the home, personal belongings, liability protection, and additional living expenses in case of temporary displacement due to covered events.

Name: SecureHome
Description: Premium policy offering high coverage limits, including protection against natural disasters, theft, and personal injury liability, with options for custom add-ons.

Name: SafeHaven Insurance
Description: Basic coverage for the home's structure and essential belongings, suitable for homeowners seeking affordable protection against common risks.

Name: Liberty Home Protection
Description: Standard policy covering damages from fire, vandalism, and certain natural disasters, along with liability coverage for accidents on the property.

Name: EverGuard Home Insurance
Description: Long-term coverage with benefits like extended replacement cost, which ensures the home can be rebuilt to its original condition even if construction costs rise.

Name: Guardian Home Assurance
Description: Policy offering protection against various perils, including water damage, mold, and coverage for high-value items like jewelry and artwork.

Name: National Home Protection
Description: Short-term policy ideal for renters, offering coverage for personal belongings, liability, and temporary living expenses in case of covered events.

Name: Reliable Home Insurance
Description: Policy tailored for homeowners with additional structures on their property, such as detached garages or sheds, providing coverage for both the main home and other structures.

Name: SmartGuard Home Insurance
Description: Customizable policy allowing homeowners to choose specific coverage limits and endorsements to protect unique assets and accommodate individual needs.

Name: SafeHome Solutions
Description: High-value policy with features like identity theft protection, credit card coverage, and coverage for unauthorized transactions due to cybercrime.

Name: HomeAssure Services
Description: Policy offering coverage for home systems and appliances, such as HVAC, electrical, and plumbing, providing financial protection against unexpected repair or replacement costs.

Name: One Home Insurance
Description: Long-term policy with perks like extended coverage for valuables, home office equipment, and reimbursement for temporary housing and meals during repairs.
